body:
Comment 2: 
I was uploading a bunch of files to Camlistore.

If you really wanted to try to reproduce, in the root of the project (git clone
git://camlistore.org/camlistore.git) there are scripts you can run:

./dev-blobserver

(to build & run a blobserver writing to a temp directory)

And:

./dev-camput -file /path/to/lots/of/medium-sized/files

(to upload to the blobserver)

If it matters, this was using a slightly modified version of those scripts listening on
TLS instead.  (few extra params)
